label: Chemical
comment: Any clearly defined substance having a defined molecular composition.

datatypeProperties.comment: A common name, expressed as text, for this distinct chemical.
A family name, expressed as text, for this transport person.
The textual description of the formula for this distinct chemical.
The percentage of the presence for this specified material.
A scientific name, expressed as text, for this trade product.
A synonym name, expressed as text, for this distinct chemical.
A code specifying a type of MDH health indication.

objectProperties.comment: An applicable toxicological hazardous material for this distinct chemical.
A characteristic applicable to this trade product.
A characteristic applicable to this sustainability inspection.
A measure of the mass of this distinct chemical.
A mass measure of this distinct chemical expressed as a ratio to another mass, such as the total mass.
The measure of the molecular weight (in grams) for this distinct chemical.
A measurement of the range of the presence of an ingredient in this distinct chemical.
A product certificate specified for this distinct chemical.
A measure of the volume of this distinct chemical.
A measure of the volume of this distinct chemical expressed as a ratio to another volume, such as the total volume.
A measure of a weight (mass) of this logistics packaging.

referencedBy.comment: A chemical used during this applied chemical treatment.
A chemical used during this applied chemical treatment.
A chemical used during this applied chemical treatment.
